rooms.description: Open-plan living area that serves as the main gathering space. Emphasis on natural light with large windows and sliding doors facing east to capture morning sunlight, adhering to Vastu principles.
Well-lit kitchen integrated with living area. Natural ventilation through south-facing windows in keeping with traditional Kerala architectural styles.
Primary bedroom with east-facing window to encourage positive energy and ample natural light, as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern bathroom design with ventilation openings at the north-east corner to maintain balance and harmony.
Dedicated home theater area in a quiet section of the bungalow, designed with proper soundproofing and controlled natural light through adjustable openings.
Compact utility space for storage and additional facilities, ensuring easy access from both living room and kitchen.

openings.details: Primary entrance with a wide foyer that adheres to traditional Kerala aesthetic; designed for ease of movement and natural light distribution.
Double-car garage ensuring seamless integration of vehicles into the home, located on the west side for easy access and adherence to safety norms.
Secondary entrance used by domestic help and deliveries, designed with security features in mind.
Strategically placed ventilation openings across the bungalow to enhance natural airflow as per Vastu recommendations.
